original_title: The Best Disco in Town - Live 2003 at Wembley
overview: In the words of Shalamar, it really was "A Night To Remember"! Seven of the best acts from the unforgettable disco era let you enjoy the greatest hits from this era. All this was recorded in the Wembley Arena in London, where 12,000 partying fans went crazy.
tagline: Seven of the best acts from the unforgettable disco era let you enjoy the greatest hits from this era.
title: The Best Disco in Town - Live 2003 at Wembley
